wikipedia_page.main: Jay Rhys Dasilva (born 22 April 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for EFL Championship club Bristol City and the England national under-21 team.

response: On 23 August 2018, still in the Championship, Kalas joined Bristol City on a season long-loan along with fellow Chelsea loanee Jay Dasilva. He made 41 appearances in all competitions with the club.
